titleStmt.title: The popish massacre as it was discovered to the honorable House of Commons, sitting in a grand committee for the suppression of popery, in the month of June 1678 at the time of the Parliaments prorogation / by Richard Greene ; or, the IV part of the present Popish Plot, farther discovered and demonstrated ; being part of Dr. Tonges collections on that subject, published for his vindication ; whereby it may appear, who were the inventers, and contrivers of this plot, and who the movers of the first discoveries of it, in which he is still a great sufferer and no plotter.
titleStmt.author: Greene, Richard, 17th cent.

titleStmt.title: The popish massacre as it was discovered to the honorable House of Commons, sitting in a grand committee for the suppression of popery, in the month of June 1678 at the time of the Parliaments prorogation / by Richard Greene ; or, the IV part of the present Popish Plot, farther discovered and demonstrated ; being part of Dr. Tonges collections on that subject, published for his vindication ; whereby it may appear, who were the inventers, and contrivers of this plot, and who the movers of the first discoveries of it, in which he is still a great sufferer and no plotter.
titleStmt.author: Greene, Richard, 17th cent.
Tonge, Ezerel, 1621-1680. Jesuits assassins. Part 4. Selections.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T.D. for John Smith ...,

notesStmt.note: Appears on Reel 927:22 as Wing T1880 (cancelled in Wing 2nd ed.), and on Reel 1149:31 as Wing G1827.
